resources.string:
Units? Micrograms? Milliliters? Tick Marks?

Frustrated? - The RPSA Pocket Reference is your quick and handy guide for peptide dosage and reconstitution information.

Our calculator takes the hassles out of the maths, making it simple to use. This pocket reference will not only help you to dose correctly, each time, every time, but also contains an encyclopaedia of wealth on all our peptides.

We continuously update our product range, so that you always have the latest information at hand.

Please feel free to contact us should you have any suggestions on how we can improve this app to make things more convenient for you.

Happy Dosing,

The RPSA Team.
